trans-unit.source: What are Mobile Apps
trans-unit.target: What are Mobile Apps

trans-unit.source: Learn what advantages does App Service bring to your enterprise mobile apps.
trans-unit.target: Learn what advantages does App Service bring to your enterprise mobile apps.

trans-unit.source: What are Mobile Apps?
trans-unit.target: What are Mobile Apps?

trans-unit.source: Azure App Service is a fully managed Platform as a Service (PaaS) offering for professional developers
trans-unit.target: Azure App Service is a fully managed Platform as a Service (PaaS) offering for professional developers

trans-unit.source: that brings a rich set of capabilities to web, mobile and integration scenarios.
trans-unit.target: that brings a rich set of capabilities to web, mobile and integration scenarios.

trans-unit.source: *Mobile Apps* in
trans-unit.target: *Mobile Apps* in

trans-unit.source: *Azure App Service* offer a highly scalable, globally available mobile application development platform
trans-unit.target: *Azure App Service* offer a highly scalable, globally available mobile application development platform

trans-unit.source: for Enterprise Developers and System Integrators that brings a rich set of capabilities to mobile developers.
trans-unit.target: for Enterprise Developers and System Integrators that brings a rich set of capabilities to mobile developers.

trans-unit.source: Mobile Apps
trans-unit.target: Mobile Apps

trans-unit.source: Why Mobile Apps?
trans-unit.target: Why Mobile Apps?

trans-unit.source: *Mobile Apps* in *Azure App Service* offers a highly scalable, globally available mobile application
trans-unit.target: *Mobile Apps* in *Azure App Service* offers a highly scalable, globally available mobile application

trans-unit.source: development platform for Enterprise Developers and System Integrators that brings a rich set of capabilities
trans-unit.target: development platform for Enterprise Developers and System Integrators that brings a rich set of capabilities

trans-unit.source: to mobile developers.
trans-unit.target: to mobile developers.

trans-unit.source: With Mobile Apps you can:
trans-unit.target: With Mobile Apps you can:

trans-unit.source: **Build native and cross platform apps** - whether you're building native iOS, Android, and Windows apps
trans-unit.target: **Build native and cross platform apps** - whether you're building native iOS, Android, and Windows apps

trans-unit.source: or cross-platform Xamarin or Cordova (Phonegap) apps, you can take advantage of App Service using native SDKs.
trans-unit.target: or cross-platform Xamarin or Cordova (Phonegap) apps, you can take advantage of App Service using native SDKs.

trans-unit.source: **Connect to your enterprise systems** - with Mobile Apps you can add corporate sign on in minutes, and
trans-unit.target: **Connect to your enterprise systems** - with Mobile Apps you can add corporate sign on in minutes, and

trans-unit.source: connect to your enterprise on-premises or cloud resources.
trans-unit.target: connect to your enterprise on-premises or cloud resources.

trans-unit.source: **Build offline-ready apps with data sync** - make your mobile workforce productive by building apps that
trans-unit.target: **Build offline-ready apps with data sync** - make your mobile workforce productive by building apps that

trans-unit.source: work offline and use Mobile Apps to sync data in the background when connectivity is present with any of your
trans-unit.target: work offline and use Mobile Apps to sync data in the background when connectivity is present with any of your

trans-unit.source: enterprise data sources or SaaS APIs.
trans-unit.target: enterprise data sources or SaaS APIs.

trans-unit.source: **Push Notifications to millions in seconds** - engage your customers with instant push notifications on
trans-unit.target: **Push Notifications to millions in seconds** - engage your customers with instant push notifications on

trans-unit.source: any device, personalized to their needs, sent when the time is right.
trans-unit.target: any device, personalized to their needs, sent when the time is right.

trans-unit.source: Mobile App Features
trans-unit.target: Mobile App Features

trans-unit.source: The following features are important to cloud-enabled mobile development:
trans-unit.target: The following features are important to cloud-enabled mobile development:

trans-unit.source: **Authentication and Authorization** - Select from an ever-growing list of identity providers, including
trans-unit.target: **Authentication and Authorization** - Select from an ever-growing list of identity providers, including

trans-unit.source: Azure Active Directory for enterprise authentication, plus social providers like Facebook, Google, Twitter
trans-unit.target: Azure Active Directory for enterprise authentication, plus social providers like Facebook, Google, Twitter

trans-unit.source: and Microsoft Account.
trans-unit.target: and Microsoft Account.

trans-unit.source: Azure Mobile Apps provides an OAuth 2.0 service for each provider.
trans-unit.target: Azure Mobile Apps provides an OAuth 2.0 service for each provider.

trans-unit.source: You can also
trans-unit.target: You can also

trans-unit.source: integrate the SDK for the identity provider for provider specific functionality.
trans-unit.target: integrate the SDK for the identity provider for provider specific functionality.

trans-unit.source: Discover more about our [authentication features].
trans-unit.target: Discover more about our [authentication features].

trans-unit.source: **Data Access** - Azure Mobile Apps provides a mobile-friendly OData v3 data source linked to SQL Azure or
trans-unit.target: **Data Access** - Azure Mobile Apps provides a mobile-friendly OData v3 data source linked to SQL Azure or

trans-unit.source: an on-premise SQL Server.
trans-unit.target: an on-premise SQL Server.

trans-unit.source: This service can be based on Entity Framework, allowing you to easily integrate
trans-unit.target: This service can be based on Entity Framework, allowing you to easily integrate

trans-unit.source: with other NoSQL and SQL data providers, including [Azure Table Storage], MongoDB, [DocumentDB] and SaaS API
trans-unit.target: with other NoSQL and SQL data providers, including [Azure Table Storage], MongoDB, [DocumentDB] and SaaS API

trans-unit.source: providers like Office 365 and Salesforce.com.
trans-unit.target: providers like Office 365 and Salesforce.com.

trans-unit.source: **Offline Sync** - Our Client SDKs make it easy for you to build robust and responsive mobile applications
trans-unit.target: **Offline Sync** - Our Client SDKs make it easy for you to build robust and responsive mobile applications

trans-unit.source: that operate with an offline data set that can be automatically synchronized with the backend data, including
trans-unit.target: that operate with an offline data set that can be automatically synchronized with the backend data, including

trans-unit.source: conflict resolution support.
trans-unit.target: conflict resolution support.

trans-unit.source: Discover more about our [data features].
trans-unit.target: Discover more about our [data features].

trans-unit.source: **Push Notifications** - Our Client SDKS seamlessly integrate with the registration capabilities of Azure
trans-unit.target: **Push Notifications** - Our Client SDKS seamlessly integrate with the registration capabilities of Azure

trans-unit.source: Notification Hubs, allowing you to send push notifications to millions of users simultaneously.
trans-unit.target: Notification Hubs, allowing you to send push notifications to millions of users simultaneously.

trans-unit.source: Discover more about our [push notification features].
trans-unit.target: Discover more about our [push notification features].

trans-unit.source: **Client SDKs** - We provide a complete set of Client SDKs that cover native development ([iOS], [Android] and
trans-unit.target: **Client SDKs** - We provide a complete set of Client SDKs that cover native development ([iOS], [Android] and

trans-unit.source: [Windows]), cross-platform development ([Xamarin for iOS and Android], [Xamarin Forms]) and hybrid application
trans-unit.target: [Windows]), cross-platform development ([Xamarin for iOS and Android], [Xamarin Forms]) and hybrid application

trans-unit.source: development ([Apache Cordova]).
trans-unit.target: development ([Apache Cordova]).

trans-unit.source: Each client SDK is available with an MIT license and is open-source.
trans-unit.target: Each client SDK is available with an MIT license and is open-source.

trans-unit.source: Azure App Service Features.
trans-unit.target: Azure App Service Features.

trans-unit.source: The following platform features are generally useful for mobile production sites.
trans-unit.target: The following platform features are generally useful for mobile production sites.

trans-unit.source: **Auto Scaling** - App Service enables you to quickly scale-up or out to handle any incoming customer
trans-unit.target: **Auto Scaling** - App Service enables you to quickly scale-up or out to handle any incoming customer

trans-unit.source: load.
trans-unit.target: load.

trans-unit.source: Manually select the number and size of VMs or set up auto-scaling to scale your mobile app backend
trans-unit.target: Manually select the number and size of VMs or set up auto-scaling to scale your mobile app backend

trans-unit.source: based on load or schedule.
trans-unit.target: based on load or schedule.

trans-unit.source: Discover more about [auto scaling].
trans-unit.target: Discover more about [auto scaling].

trans-unit.source: **Staging Environments** - App Service can run multiple versions of your site, allowing you to perform A/B testing, test
trans-unit.target: **Staging Environments** - App Service can run multiple versions of your site, allowing you to perform A/B testing, test

trans-unit.source: in production as part of a larger DevOps plan and do in-place staging of a new backend.
trans-unit.target: in production as part of a larger DevOps plan and do in-place staging of a new backend.

trans-unit.source: Discover more about [staging environments].
trans-unit.target: Discover more about [staging environments].

trans-unit.source: **Continuous Deployment** - App Service can integrate with common SCM systems, allowing you to automatically deploy
trans-unit.target: **Continuous Deployment** - App Service can integrate with common SCM systems, allowing you to automatically deploy

trans-unit.source: a new version of your backend by pushing to a branch of your SCM system.
trans-unit.target: a new version of your backend by pushing to a branch of your SCM system.

trans-unit.source: Discover more about [deployment options].
trans-unit.target: Discover more about [deployment options].

trans-unit.source: **Virtual Networking** - App Service can connect to on-premise resources using virtual network, ExpressRoute or hybrid
trans-unit.target: **Virtual Networking** - App Service can connect to on-premise resources using virtual network, ExpressRoute or hybrid

trans-unit.source: connections.
trans-unit.target: connections.

trans-unit.source: Discover more about [hybrid connections], [virtual networks], and [ExpressRoute].
trans-unit.target: Discover more about [hybrid connections], [virtual networks], and [ExpressRoute].

trans-unit.source: **Isolated / Dedicated Environments** - App Service can be run in a fully isolated and dedicated enviroment for securely
trans-unit.target: **Isolated / Dedicated Environments** - App Service can be run in a fully isolated and dedicated enviroment for securely

trans-unit.source: running Azure App Service apps at high scale.
trans-unit.target: running Azure App Service apps at high scale.

trans-unit.source: This is ideal for application workloads requiring very high scale, isolation
trans-unit.target: This is ideal for application workloads requiring very high scale, isolation

trans-unit.source: or secure network access.
trans-unit.target: or secure network access.

trans-unit.source: Discover more about [App Service Environments].
trans-unit.target: Discover more about [App Service Environments].

trans-unit.source: Getting Started
trans-unit.target: Getting Started

trans-unit.source: To get started with Mobile Apps, follow the [Get Started] tutorial.
trans-unit.target: To get started with Mobile Apps, follow the [Get Started] tutorial.

trans-unit.source: This will cover the basics
trans-unit.target: This will cover the basics

trans-unit.source: of producing a mobile backend and client of your choice, then integrating authentication, offline
trans-unit.target: of producing a mobile backend and client of your choice, then integrating authentication, offline

trans-unit.source: sync and push notifications.
trans-unit.target: sync and push notifications.

trans-unit.source: You can follow the [Get Started] tutorial several times - once for
trans-unit.target: You can follow the [Get Started] tutorial several times - once for

trans-unit.source: each client application.
trans-unit.target: each client application.

trans-unit.source: For more information on Azure Mobile Apps, please review our [learning map].
trans-unit.target: For more information on Azure Mobile Apps, please review our [learning map].

trans-unit.source: For more information on the Azure App Service platform, see [Azure App Service].
trans-unit.target: For more information on the Azure App Service platform, see [Azure App Service].

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] If you want to get started with Azure App Service before signing up for an
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] If you want to get started with Azure App Service before signing up for an

trans-unit.source: Azure account, go to [Try App Service](https://tryappservice.azure.com/?appServiceName=mobile), where
trans-unit.target: Azure account, go to [Try App Service](https://tryappservice.azure.com/?appServiceName=mobile), where

trans-unit.source: you can immediately create a short-lived starter web app in App Service.
trans-unit.target: you can immediately create a short-lived starter web app in App Service.

trans-unit.source: No credit cards required;
trans-unit.target: No credit cards required;

trans-unit.source: no commitments.
trans-unit.target: no commitments.
